description: Gets information about a Deployment resource.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Deployment resource to get information about.

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: A query parameter to retrieve the specified embedded resources of the returned Deployment resource in the response. In a REST API call, this embed parameter value is a list of comma-separated strings, as in GET /restapis/{restapi_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}?embed=var1,var2. The SDK and other platform-dependent libraries might use a different format for the list. Currently, this request supports only retrieval of the embedded API summary this way. Hence, the parameter value must be a single-valued list containing only the "apisummary" string. For example, GET /restapis/{restapi_id}/deployments/{deployment_id}?embed=apisummary. (string) ---

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the deployment resource.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the deployment resource.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the deployment resource was created.

nested_items.name: apiSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the RestApi at the date and time that the deployment resource was created.

nested_items.name: authorizationType
nested_items.description: The method's authorization type. Valid values are NONE for open access, AWS_IAM for using AWS IAM permissions, CUSTOM for using a custom authorizer, or COGNITO_USER_POOLS for using a Cognito user pool.

nested_items.name: apiKeyRequired
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the method requires a valid ApiKey.
